Posts.Content: Sep 29, 2008 06:30PM mom23 wrote: no, neither I nor the baby is sick...I'm just sick with worry.  It's different fron other nursing issues I've had.  It just feels so odd - not pea or marble shaped, more like this hard, flattened mass
Posts.Title: I am so scared mom23 dalycity

Posts.Content: mom23 wrote: While I was nursing my little one, I felt this mass - I can't really describe it - it was like a thickened or hardened part of my breast (left side, at the top) it isn't a definable lump, just this thick mass that seems pretty large. it's been there a few days and doesn't feel like a clog (I have had plenty and know what they feel like). The doctor is seeing me tomorrow but meanwhile I am in a panic. Does anyone know anything about these thickened masses rather than lumps? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: I am so scared mom23 dalycity
